description: Behaving freely without restraint. "Langdang buji" has the same meaning.

examples.chinese: 原谅我一生放荡不羁爱自由
examples.translation: Forgive my life of being uninhibited and loving freedom.

examples.chinese: 外表放荡不羁,内心温柔体贴的人
examples.translation: A person who looks uninhibited on the outside but is gentle and considerate on the inside.

examples.chinese: 他有时间,放荡不羁地旅游去
examples.translation: When he has time, he goes traveling in an uninhibited way.

examples.chinese: 我追求的生活态度,放浪不羁,自由自在
examples.translation: The attitude towards life I pursue is uninhibited and free.
